languages.text: "Убереги нас от смятения духов машин, ибо без даров Его бесплодны наши жертвы..." {n}Вы едва слышите голос молодого {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}астропата{/g}, замершего рядом с массивным механизмом. Обескровленные ладони прижаты к груди, в пальцах зажаты смятые отрезки толстой бумаги, а на опущенном лице застыла маска отчаяния. Заслышав ваши шаги, астропат осекается.{/n}
languages.translation_comment: Энжинсир смотрит на барабан, молится, астропат ругается с энжинсиром, не смотрит на РТ

traits.locale_text: "Это недопустимо!" {n}Повышенный тон молодого астропата эхом разносится по капелле, смешиваясь с какофонией звуков. Он яростно трясет сжатыми в руках отрезками толстой бумаги и, судя по его позе, из последних сил сдерживается, чтобы не наброситься на технопровидца.{/n} "Доколе это будет продолжаться? Уже больше суток прошло!"

languages.translation_comment: Энжинсир смотрит на барабан, молится, астропат ругается с энжинсиром, не смотрит на РТ

languages.text: "Protect us from the machine spirits' unrest, for without His gifts our sacrifices are fruitless..." {n}You can barely hear the voice of the young {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} standing very still next to the bulky mechanism, his face frozen in a mask of despair. His anaemic hands are pressed to his chest, clutching crumpled strips of thick paper. He hears you approach and composes himself.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Убереги нас от смятения духов машин, ибо без даров Его бесплодны наши жертвы..." {n}Вы едва слышите голос молодого {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}астропата{/g}, замершего рядом с массивным механизмом. Обескровленные ладони прижаты к груди, в пальцах зажаты смятые отрезки толстой бумаги, а на опущенном лице застыла маска отчаяния. Заслышав ваши шаги, астропат осекается.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Protect us from the machine spirits' unrest, for without His gifts our sacrifices are fruitless..." {n}You can barely hear the voice of the young astropath standing very still next to the bulky mechanism. His anaemic hands are pressed to his chest. He's clutching crumpled strips of thick paper in his fingers. A masklike expression of despair is frozen on his face. The astropath hears you approach and checks himself.{/n}

His anaemic hands are pressed to his chest, clutching crumpled strips of thick paper. He hears you approach and composes himself.{/n}

languages.text: «Protégenos de la agitación de los espíritus máquina, pues sin Sus dones nuestros sacrificios son en vano...». {n}Distingues a duras penas la voz del joven {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astrópata{/g} que permanece casi inmóvil junto al enorme mecanismo, con el rostro paralizado en una expresión desesperada. Sus manos anémicas presionan su pecho, aferrando tiras arrugadas de un papel grueso. Al oír tus pasos, se recompone.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Protect us from the machine spirits' unrest, for without His gifts our sacrifices are fruitless..." {n}You can barely hear the voice of the young {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} standing very still next to the bulky mechanism, his face frozen in a mask of despair. His anaemic hands are pressed to his chest, clutching crumpled strips of thick paper. He hears you approach and composes himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Protégenos de la agitación de los espíritus máquina, pues sin Sus dones nuestros sacrificios son en vano...». {n}Distingues a duras penas la voz del joven Astrópata que permanece casi inmóvil junto al enorme mecanismo, con el rostro paralizado en una expresión desesperada. Sus manos anémicas presionan su pecho, aferrando tiras arrugadas de un papel grueso. Al oír tus pasos, se recompone.{/n}

languages.text: 「機械精霊の混乱から我々をお守りください。皇帝からのお贈り物がなければ、私たちの犠牲が無駄になる…」{n}若い{g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}感応通信官{/g}は巨大な機械の横にじっと立ち、絶望に染まって凍りついたような表情のまま、消え入るような声でつぶやく。血色の悪い両の手を胸に押し当てて、しわくちゃになった厚い紙を握りしめている。男はこちらの足音に気づいてハッとした。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Protect us from the machine spirits' unrest, for without His gifts our sacrifices are fruitless..." {n}You can barely hear the voice of the young {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} standing very still next to the bulky mechanism, his face frozen in a mask of despair. His anaemic hands are pressed to his chest, clutching crumpled strips of thick paper. He hears you approach and composes himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「機械精霊の混乱から我々をお守りください。皇帝からのお贈り物がなければ、私たちの犠牲が無駄になる…」{n}若い感応通信官は巨大な機械の横にじっと立ち、絶望に染まって凍りついたような表情のまま、消え入るような声でつぶやく。血色の悪い両の手を胸に押し当てて、しわくちゃになった厚い紙を握りしめている。男はこちらの足音に気づいてハッとした。{/n}

languages.text: “请保护我们免于机魂的怒火，因为若是失去了祂的恩赐，我们的一切牺牲都将注定徒劳无功……”{n}你几乎听不清这位{g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}星语者{/g}的声音。他一动不动站在笨重的机器旁边，满脸都是绝望之色。他贫血的双手紧紧压在胸前，手里握着皱巴巴的厚纸。听到你走近时，他努力镇定下来。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Protect us from the machine spirits' unrest, for without His gifts our sacrifices are fruitless..." {n}You can barely hear the voice of the young {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} standing very still next to the bulky mechanism, his face frozen in a mask of despair. His anaemic hands are pressed to his chest, clutching crumpled strips of thick paper. He hears you approach and composes himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “请保护我们免于机魂的怒火，因为若是失去了祂的恩赐，我们的一切牺牲都将注定徒劳无功……”{n}你几乎听不清这位星语者的声音。他一动不动站在笨重的机器旁边，满脸都是绝望之色。他贫血的双手紧紧压在胸前，手里握着皱巴巴的厚纸。听到你走近时，他努力镇定下来。{/n}

languages.text: "Beschützt uns vor den Unruhen der Maschinengeister, denn ohne die Gaben des Imperators sind unsere Opfer fruchtlos ..." {n}Du hörst die Stimme des jungen {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropathen{/g} kaum, der fast reglos neben dem klobigen Mechanismus steht, sein Gesicht zu einer Maske der Verzweiflung eingefroren. Er hält zerknüllte Streifen aus dickem Papier in den blutleeren Händen, fest an seine Brust gepresst. Er hört dich kommen und sammelt sich.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Protect us from the machine spirits' unrest, for without His gifts our sacrifices are fruitless..." {n}You can barely hear the voice of the young {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} standing very still next to the bulky mechanism, his face frozen in a mask of despair. His anaemic hands are pressed to his chest, clutching crumpled strips of thick paper. He hears you approach and composes himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Beschützt uns vor den Unruhen der Maschinengeister, denn ohne die Gaben des Imperators sind unsere Opfer fruchtlos ..." {n}Du hörst die Stimme des jungen Astropathen kaum, der fast reglos neben dem klobigen Mechanismus steht, sein Gesicht zu einer Maske der Verzweiflung eingefroren. Er hält zerknüllte Streifen aus dickem Papier in den blutleeren Händen, fest an seine Brust gepresst. Er hört dich kommen und sammelt sich.{/n}

languages.text: « Protégez-nous de l'agitation des esprits de la machine, car sans Ses augustes dons, nos sacrifies sont vains... » {n}Vous entendez à peine la voix du jeune {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}astropathe{/g} qui se tient immobile près du mécanisme imposant, le visage figé en un masque de désespoir. Pressées contre sa poitrine, ses mains anémiques serrent des bandes froissées de papier épais. Il vous entend approcher et s'efforce de faire bonne figure.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Protect us from the machine spirits' unrest, for without His gifts our sacrifices are fruitless..." {n}You can barely hear the voice of the young {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} standing very still next to the bulky mechanism, his face frozen in a mask of despair. His anaemic hands are pressed to his chest, clutching crumpled strips of thick paper. He hears you approach and composes himself.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Protégez-nous de l'agitation des esprits de la machine, car sans Ses augustes dons, nos sacrifies sont vains... » {n}Vous entendez à peine la voix du jeune astropathe qui se tient immobile près du mécanisme imposant, le visage figé en un masque de désespoir. Pressées contre sa poitrine, ses mains anémiques serrent des bandes froissées de papier épais. Il vous entend approcher et s'efforce de faire bonne figure.{/n}

« Protégez-nous de l'agitation des esprits de la machine, car sans Ses augustes dons, nos sacrifies sont vains... » {n}Vous entendez à peine la voix du jeune astropathe qui se tient immobile près du mécanisme imposant, le visage figé en un masque de désespoir. Pressées contre sa poitrine, ses mains anémiques serrent des bandes froissées de papier épais. Il vous entend approcher et s'efforce de faire bonne figure.{/n}

languages.text: "Makine ruhlarının huzursuzluklarından bizi koru. Zira O'nun armağanları olmadan kurban vermek nafiledir..." {n}Devasa mekanizmanın yanında sabit duran genç {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropat{/g}'ın sesini zar zor duyuyorsun. Yüzüne çaresizlikle örtülü, donakalmış bir ifade hâkim. Solgun ellerini göğsüne bastırarak buruşmuş kalın kâğıt parçalarını sıkı sıkıya kavrıyor. Yaklaştığını duymasıyla birlikte kendini toparlıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Protect us from the machine spirits' unrest, for without His gifts our sacrifices are fruitless..." {n}You can barely hear the voice of the young {g|Encyclopedia:AstropathGlossary}Astropath{/g} standing very still next to the bulky mechanism, his face frozen in a mask of despair. His anaemic hands are pressed to his chest, clutching crumpled strips of thick paper. He hears you approach and composes himself.{/n}
